title: Mating Season
description: It’s twenty-one-year-old Justin’s first time hunting the Legendary Bears. He enters the wilderness hoping to make his father proud, but instead of killing the bear, he falls in love with him. Michael, a shape-shifting Alpha bear, is the leader of his clan. His brother, Achilles, has been waiting for a chance to challenge him. When Achilles finds out Michael’s new mate, Justin, may be pregnant, as well as unable to shape-shift, Achilles tries to attack his brother’s mate. His attempt to provoke Michael succeeds. Achilles is a strong foe; will Michael survive the confrontation?  Please Note: This book contains Adult Language & Steamy Adult Activities, it is intended for 18+ Adults Only. Short Story, approx. 10,000 words in length. HEA (happy ever after ending). There is a "cliffhanger" at the end of this story (Volume 1). Volume 2 is available free (linked in the book). Alpha, Omega, Bear Shifter, & MPREG (Male Pregnancy) themes.
author: Apollo Surge
